mapper.sql: id, name, phone, email, room_type, person_num, target, money_sum, passport
mapper.insert:
insert into order_info
id,
name,
phone,
email,
room_type,
person_num,
target,
money_sum,
passport,

mapper.update:
update order_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_type = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person_num = #{personNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money_sum = #{moneySum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passport = #{passport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_type = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person_num = #{personNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money_sum = #{moneySum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passport = #{passport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t.name, t.id, t.phone, t.email, t.room_type as roomType, t.person_num as personNum, t.target, t.money_sum as moneySum, t.passport, t.tx, t.schedule FROM order_info t
